law.text: It shall be unlawful for any for any person to use water in violation of this Article or any of the mandatory water use restriction ordinances approved by the Raleigh City Council. It shall also be unlawful for any person to use potable water from the public water system, if reuse water from the City reuse water supply system is equally available to the same location and the water use does not require potable water quality. (Ord. No. 2007-235, ยง1, 5-15-07)
